comp401.sushi

Class IngredientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp401.sushi.IngredientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    comp401.sushi.Ingredient

    public class IngredientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements comp401.sushi.Ingredient
    A general implementation for the Ingredient interfacce. It contains common implementation for the subclasses from Avocado to Shrimp.
    Author:
    KMP
